title: Can I play with a rioter for my 1000th win??
body: I woke up today, i started playing few games with my friends and realized that i had 994 wins. I'll stop at 999 win which i intend to get today! for my 1000th win, can i play with a rioter? i would like to add a rioter as a friend. thanks for your consideration! Add me in game level100yasuo

replies.body:
Hey Level100 Yasuo!

That's an awesome milestone you're about to hit. The best places to reach out for something like this is on either [Miscellaneous](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) or [General Discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/mNBeEEkI). 

Congrats again, let me know if you have any questions. :]

read the post, but did not answer.
Typically RIOT.
